Server.Name: Oasis Mod Alpha 18
Server.Description:
This is the suggested method of installing this mod This Version Will Download a fresh copy of 7dtd from steam or get 7dtd from your catche if you have one
Mod Discription: This is an XML only mod I wrote and maintain on the Oasis PVE Server
- 7dtd Mod on Oasis PVE Server - Increased stacks - Mod to solarbank - Craftable Solar cells - Encreased power output for Solar pannels - Demolisher BlockDamage disabled - New Item Mjolner Axe tierd and lootable - Motorcycle Speed increased - Mine Explosion.RadiusEntities increased - New Item Blunt added - all ammo stacks to 1000 And much more.......

Server.Name: Oasis Mod Alpha 18 (COPY)
Server.Description:
This Version Will copy 7dtd from your steam install only use this method if you're sure you don't have any other mods installed
Mod Discription: This is an XML only mod I wrote and maintain on the Oasis PVE Server
- 7dtd Mod on Oasis PVE Server - Increased stacks - Mod to solarbank - Craftable Solar cells - Encreased power output for Solar pannels - Demolisher BlockDamage disabled - New Item Mjolner Axe tierd and lootable - Motorcycle Speed increased - Mine Explosion.RadiusEntities increased - New Item Blunt added - all ammo stacks to 1000 And much more.......
